Key Match Events: Eduardo Vargas scored in the 2nd minute for Chile.
Igor Jesus scored in the 45'+1' minute for Brazil.
Luiz Henrique scored in the 89th minute for Brazil, securing a last-gasp victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brazil achieved a 2-1 away victory over Chile in the South American World Cup qualifiers.
The match took place at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos in Santiago, Chile, with an attendance of 43,059.
